      • calculateReward

        public int calculateReward(Journey journey,
                  int optimalNumberOfTurns)
        Calculate the Score that a given completed journey will be rewarded for accomplishing the goal
        Specified by:
        calculateReward in interface GoalInterface
        Parameters:
        journey - The completed journey that the train travelled
        optimalNumberOfTurns - Calculated shortest number of turns it would take the train travelling at its base speed
        Returns:
        Points to be added to a player's score

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Calculate shortest number of turns it will take a train to complete, travelling at its base speed
        Specified by:
        optimalNumberOfTurns in interface GoalInterface
        Parameters:
        shortestPathLength - Should first be calculated using Dijkstra's algorithm
        baseSpeed - The unmodified speed of a train
